SettingsItem.Name: Method for generating individual set for air exposures
SettingsItem.Description: Method for generating individual set for generation of air exposures.

SettingsItem.Name: Resample indoor/outdoor air concentrations
SettingsItem.Description: Air concentration data (indoor and outdoor) are resampled from the original database using the bootstrap methodology (Efron 1979, Efron & Tibshirani 1993).
